#summary How to download and run the example files from Flexbuilder.

Plese read SubclipseInstructions if you haven't installed the subclipse plugin in Flexbuilder 

# Open the svn repository explorer by selecting the menu Window > Open Perspective > 
Other ... and clicking on *SVN Repository Exploring*
# Right-click anywhere in the *SVN Repository* window on the left, and from the menu select New > Repository Location...
# Enter the url given in the svn link of hte example yopu wish to download. For the EngineTest example, this is http://away3d.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/examples/EngineTest/. Click on finish. IF the url is correct, the new repository location should appear in your *SVN Repository* window
